title: Book Tracker App
description: A book tracker web application to search for books, build a virtual collection, providing a responsive and user-friendly interface across devices.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard application showcasing my proficiency in utilising APIs and local storage to provide users with the current weather and 5-day forecast for any city worldwide

title: Team Profile Generator
description: This is an easy-to-use Node.js application. It takes in information about employees, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This is a workday scheduler app that allows users to input and save their plans in hourly blocks, ensuring data persistence even after closing the browser.

title: Readme Generator
description: This app makes it easier for developers to create README.md files for their projects. It requires the user to answer a few questions displayed on the console and the file will be generated.

title: Code Quiz Game
description: A timed quiz game to test your skills in HTML, CSS and JavaScript by answering multiple-choice questions.

title: Random Password Generator
description: This project is a customizable password generator. Users can specify length (8-128 characters) and character types (special, numeric, lower/upper case), and the generated password is displayed for easy copying.
